name: <Element>.append
desc: Appends an Element inside of an existing Element (at the end).

variants.desc: Appends the passed Element to the inside of the parent Element.

name: <Element>.attr
desc: Gets or sets an attribute of an Element.

variants.desc: Returns the value of an attribute of the Element.

param.name: Name
param.desc: The name of the attribute to read

returns.desc: The value of the attribute (empty string, if not found)

variants.desc: Returns the value of an attribute of the Element.

param.name: Name
param.desc: The name of the attribute to read.

variants.desc: Factory method to create a new Element with the passed name.

param.name: Name
param.desc: The name of the Element to create

returns.desc: The newly created Element (or null if the Element could not be created)

name: <Element>.text
desc: Gets or sets the text node of an Element

variants.desc: Returns the text content the Element.

returns.desc: The text value of the attribute (as returned by textContent)

variants.desc: Sets the text content of the Element.
